error.message: Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Call to deprecated function user_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\user\Entity\User::load().

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Call to deprecated function taxonomy_term_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\taxonomy\Entity\Term::load().
Call to deprecated function user_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\user\Entity\User::load().

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Parameter $query_factory of method Drupal\audit_locale\Form\AuditLocaleConfigForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function user_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\user\Entity\User::load().
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

The 'audit_locale_rule_edit_form' library is depending on a deprecated library. The "core/jquery.ui.spinner" asset library is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3067969

The 'audit_locale_overview_form' library is depending on a deprecated library. The "core/jquery.ui.spinner" asset library is deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3067969
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to audit_locale.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
